summary.span: 提供与当前应用程序相关的属性、方法和事件。

span.span: Provides properties, methods, and events related to the current application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application` 对象公开的属性返回仅与当前应用程序或 DLL 关联的数据。The properties exposed by the `My.Application` object return data that is associated only with the current application or DLL. 无法使用 `My.Application` 更改任何系统级信息。No system-level information can be altered with `My.Application`. `My.Application` 对象由以下类组成：The `My.Application` object consists of the following classes: - 提供了所有项目中的可用成员。 provides members that are available in all projects. - 提供 Windows 窗体应用程序中可用的成员。 provides members that are available in Windows Forms applications. - 提供了可在控制台应用程序中使用的成员。 provides members that are available in console applications. ## Examples 此示例使用循环来循环访问应用程序的打开的窗体，选择可由当前线程直接访问的窗体，并在 控件中显示其标题。This example uses a loop to iterate through the application's open forms, selects the forms that can be accessed directly by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 有关如何访问打开的窗体的信息，请参阅 。For information about how to access the open forms, see . [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 此示例要求 Windows 窗体应用程序具有一个名为 `Form1` 的窗体，该窗体包含一个名为 `ListBox1`的列表框。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public instance void DoEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 处理当前在消息队列中的所有 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法，你的应用程序可以处理运行代码时可能引发的其他事件。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method allows your application to handle other events that might be raised while you code runs. `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法与 方法具有相同的行为。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method has the same behavior as the method. 运行 Windows 窗体应用程序时，会创建一个新的窗体，该窗体随后将等待处理事件。When you run a Windows Forms application, it creates a new form, which then waits for events to be handled. 每次窗体处理一个事件（例如按钮单击）时，它都会处理与该事件关联的所有代码。Each time the form handles an event, such as a button click, it processes all the code associated with that event. 所有其他事件都在队列中等待。All other events wait in the queue. 当代码处理事件时，应用程序不会响应。While your code handles the event, your application does not respond. 例如，如果将另一窗口拖到顶部，则窗口不会重新绘制。For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top. 如果在代码中调用 `My.Application.DoEvents`，应用程序可以处理其他事件。If you call `My.Application.DoEvents` in your code, your application can handle the other events. 例如，如果代码将数据添加到循环中的 ，并在循环的每个步骤调用 `My.Application.DoEvents`后，窗体将在拖动另一窗口时重新绘制。For example, if your code adds data to a in a loop, and after each step of the loop it calls `My.Application.DoEvents`, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it. 如果从代码中删除 `My.Application.DoEvents`，则在完成执行该按钮的 click 事件处理程序之前，将不会重新绘制窗体。If you remove `My.Application.DoEvents` from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing. 通常，在循环中使用此方法来处理消息。Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法不以与窗体相同的方式处理事件。The `My.Application.DoEvents` method does not process events in exactly the same way as the form does. 使用多线程处理可以直接处理事件。Use multithreading to make the form directly handle the events. 有关详细信息，请参阅[多线程应用程序](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6)。For more information, see [Multithreaded Applications](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a06a1a56-dd16-44e8-bc01-2c2255511bc6). > [!CAUTION] > 如果处理用户界面（UI）事件的方法调用 `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法，则该方法可能会在完成之前重新进入。If a method that handles a user interface (UI) event calls the `My.Application.DoEvents` method, the method might be re-entered before it finishes. 出现这种情况的原因可能是 `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法处理 Windows 消息，而 Windows 消息则可能引发事件。This can happen because the `My.Application.DoEvents` method processes Windows messages, and Windows messages can raise events. 下表列出了涉及 `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法的任务的示例。The following table lists an example of a task involving the `My.Application.DoEvents` method. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |允许窗体在繁忙的情况下响应 UI 输入Allow a form to respond to UI input while busy|[演练：处理事件Walkthrough: Handling Events](~/docs/visual-basic/programming-guide/language-features/events/walkthrough-handling-events.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.DoEvents` 方法来允许 `TextBox1` 更新的 UI。This example uses the `My.Application.DoEvents` method to allow the UI for `TextBox1` to update. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#6)] 此代码应采用具有 `Text` 属性的 `TextBox1` 组件的形式。This code should be in a form that has a `TextBox1` component with a `Text` property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 `MainForm` 属性可获取或设置 Visual Basic 应用程序启动/关闭模型使用的 对象作为应用程序的主窗体。Use the `MainForm` property to get or set the object that the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model uses as the application's main form. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 的应用程序启动/关闭模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application Startup/Shutdown model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 当应用程序关闭时，对此属性所做的更改不会保留。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久更改主窗体，必须在 "**项目设计器**" 中更改设置。To change the main form permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示初始屏幕的最小时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

value.span: 初始屏幕的最小显示时间长度（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: The minimum length of time, in milliseconds, for which the splash screen is displayed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` 属性允许您指定应用程序初始屏幕的最小显示时间长度。The `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property allows you to specify the minimum length of time you want the application's splash screen to be displayed. 如果主窗体完成初始化的时间比此属性指定的时间少，初始屏幕将一直保持到所请求的时间量，此时将显示主窗体。If the main form finishes initializing in less time than what is specified by this property, the splash screen remains until the requested amount of time passes, at which time the main form is displayed. 如果应用程序需要较长时间才能启动，则在主窗体变为活动状态后，初始屏幕将关闭。If your application takes longer to start, the splash screen is closed once the main form becomes active. 使用 "项目设计器" 将初始屏幕添加到应用程序时，它会将 `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` 属性设置为2000，提供两秒钟的最小显示时间。When you add a splash screen to your application using the Project Designer, it sets the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property to 2000, giving a minimum display time of two seconds. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 应在重写 或 方法的方法中设置 `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` 属性。You should set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property in a method that overrides the or method. 在默认情况下，将在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中输入重写 类的方法的代码。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问用于重写成员的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例演示如何通过重写 属性来设置 `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` 属性。This example demonstrates how to set the `My.Application.MinimumSplashScreenDisplayTime` property by overriding the property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#51](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#51)] 此示例要求项目具有初始屏幕。This example requires that the project have a splash screen. 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event NetworkAvailabilityChanged As NetworkAvailableEventHandler

summary.span: 在网络可用性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the network availability changes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每次网络可用性发生变化时，应用程序都会引发 `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` 事件。An application raises the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event every time that the availability of the network changes. 您可以使用 `e` 参数的 属性来获取网络连接的新状态。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to get the new state of the network connection. 若要获取网络连接的当前状态，请使用 属性。To get the current state of the network connection, use the property. 此事件在应用程序的主线程上通过其他用户界面事件引发。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这样，事件处理程序便可以直接访问应用程序的 UI。This enables the event handler to access directly the application's UI. 但是，如果在引发此事件时，应用程序正在忙于处理另一个用户界面事件，则在其他事件处理程序完成或调用 方法之前，将无法处理此事件。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. 事件提供与此事件相同的功能，但可用于所有应用程序类型。The event provides the same functionality as this event but is available for all application types. `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` 事件处理程序的代码存储在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中，该文件在默认情况下处于隐藏状态。The code for the `NetworkAvailabilityChanged` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问应用程序事件的 "代码编辑器" 窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1. 在解决方案资源管理器中选择了一个项目 **。**1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer.** 单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| > [!NOTE] > 即使集线器与较大的网络断开连接，许多网络中心也会提供网络连接。Many network hubs will provide a network connection even if the hub is disconnected from a larger network. 因此，对于有线连接，此事件表示计算机和集线器之间的连接发生更改。Consequently, for wired connections, this event indicates change in the connection between the computer and a hub. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 当网络可用性发生变化时，此示例将调用默认 `Form1` 类的 `SetConnectionStatus` 方法。This example calls the `SetConnectionStatus` method of the default `Form1` class when the network availability changes. 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的 "备注" 部分中的说明进行操作。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 项目应具有一个名为 `Form1`的窗体。The project should have a form named `Form1`. 它应该具有一个名为 `SetConnectionStatus` 的方法，该方法采用 `Boolean` 参数。It should have a method named `SetConnectionStatus` that takes a `Boolean` parameter. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#9)]

abstract member OnInitialize : System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string> -> bool override this.OnInitialize : System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection<string> -> bool

param.name: commandLineArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.OpenForms` 属性获取应用程序的所有打开窗体的集合。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property gets a collection of all the application's open forms. 此行为与 属性相同。The behavior is identical to the property. > [!NOTE] > `My.Application.OpenForms` 属性返回所有打开的窗体，而不管哪个线程打开了窗体。The `My.Application.OpenForms` property returns all open forms, regardless of which thread opened them. 在访问之前，应检查每个窗体的 属性;否则，可能会引发 异常。You should check the property of each form before accessing it; otherwise, it might throw an exception. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例循环访问应用程序的打开的窗体，选择当前线程可直接访问的窗体，并在 控件中显示其标题。This example loops over the application's open forms, selects the ones directly accessible by the current thread, and displays their titles in a control. 此示例要求 Windows 窗体应用程序具有一个名为 `Form1` 的窗体，该窗体包含一个名为 `ListBox1`的列表框。This example requires that your Windows Forms application have a form named `Form1` that contains a list box named `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#10)] 此示例将遍历应用程序的打开的窗体，并在 控件中显示其标题。This example loops over the application's open forms and displays their titles in a control. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks `SaveMySettingsOnExit` 属性允许用户在运行时更改应用程序保存设置的方式。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property allows the user to change how the application saves settings, at run time. 您可以使用 `My.Settings` 对象的 方法显式保存设置更改。You can explicitly save setting changes by using the method of the `My.Settings` object. 有关更改和保存设置的详细信息，请参阅[应用程序属性](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254)。For more information about changing and saving settings, see [Application Properties](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0ad4926f-636e-41f8-a5b1-faf9d9b0a254). 当应用程序关闭时，对此属性所做的更改不会保留。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久更改 `SaveMySettingsOnExit` 属性，必须在 "**项目设计器**" 中更改设置：To change the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**: | | |-| |更改 "项目设计器" 中的设置To change the setting in the Project Designer| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择了一个项目。1. Have a project selected in **Solution Explorer**. 单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。Click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 选择 **"关闭时保存设置"**。3. Select **Save My.Settings on Shutdown**.| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例有两部分。This example has two parts. - `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit` 子例程，该子例程将 控件的选中状态初始化为 `SaveMySettingsOnExit` 属性的当前值。The `InitializeSaveMySettingsOnExit` subroutine, which initializes the checked state of a control to the current value of the `SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. - `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged` 子例程，该子例程处理对 控件的更改以更新 `My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit` 属性。The `SaveMySettingsOnExit_CheckedChanged` subroutine, which handles changes to a control to update the `My.Application.SaveMySettingsOnExit` property. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/Form1.vb#12)] 要使此示例正常运行，应用程序必须具有一个名为 `SaveMySettingsOnExit` 控件。For this example to work, your application must have a control named `SaveMySettingsOnExit`.

summary.span: 在应用程序关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application shuts down.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 应用程序在退出前引发 `Shutdown` 事件。An application raises the `Shutdown` event before it exits. 这允许您控制应用程序关闭其资源的方式。This allows you to control how the application closes its resources. 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). `Shutdown` 事件处理程序的代码存储在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中，该文件在默认情况下处于隐藏状态。The code for the `Shutdown` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问应用程序事件的 "代码编辑器" 窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例在应用程序关闭时记录消息。This example logs messages when the application shuts down. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#13)] 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的 "备注" 部分中的说明进行操作。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：在应用程序启动或关闭时记录消息](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md)。For more information, see [How to: Log Messages When the Application Starts or Shuts Down](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-messages-when-the-application-starts-or-shuts-down.md).

The splash screen for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `My.Application.SplashScreen` 属性允许您获取或设置应用程序用作初始屏幕的 对象，这是在启动应用程序时显示的第一个图形窗体。The `My.Application.SplashScreen` property allows you to get or set the object that the application uses as the splash screen, the first graphic form that is displayed while an application is being started. 此属性支持 Visual Basic 应用程序模型。This property supports the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 当应用程序关闭时，对此属性所做的更改不会保留。The changes to this property are not persisted when the application closes. 若要永久更改初始屏幕，必须在 "**项目设计器**" 中更改设置。To change the splash screen permanently, you must change the setting in the **Project Designer**. ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.SplashScreen` 属性和 `My.Application.Startup` 事件，在应用程序启动时使用状态信息更新初始屏幕。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 此示例要求项目具有一个名为 `SplashScreen1`的初始屏幕。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 初始屏幕需要具有一个名为 `Status` 的属性，该属性将更新其用户界面。The splash screen needs to have a property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Startup As StartupEventHandler

summary.span: 在应用程序启动时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application starts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 正常（非单实例）应用程序每次启动时都会引发 `Startup` 事件。A normal (non-single-instance) application raises the `Startup` event every time it starts. 仅当应用程序尚未处于活动状态时，单实例应用程序才会引发 `Startup` 事件;否则，会引发 `StartupNextInstance` 事件。A single-instance application raises the `Startup` event when it starts only if the application is not already active; otherwise, it raises the `StartupNextInstance` event. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 您可以使用 `e` 参数的 属性来控制应用程序的启动窗体的加载。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control the loading of an application's startup form. 属性设置为 `True`时，启动窗体不会启动。When the property is set to `True`, the startup form does not start. 在这种情况下，代码应调用另一个启动代码路径。In that case, your code should call an alternate startup code path. 您可以使用 `e` 参数的 属性或 属性来访问应用程序的命令行参数。You can use the property of the `e` parameter or the property to access the application's command-line arguments. `Startup` 事件处理程序的代码存储在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中，该文件在默认情况下处于隐藏状态。The code for the `Startup` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问应用程序事件的 "代码编辑器" 窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.SplashScreen` 属性和 `My.Application.Startup` 事件，在应用程序启动时使用状态信息更新初始屏幕。This example uses the `My.Application.SplashScreen` property and the `My.Application.Startup` event to update the splash screen with status information as the application starts. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#14)] 此示例要求项目具有一个名为 `SplashScreen1`的初始屏幕。This example requires that the project have a splash screen named `SplashScreen1`. 初始屏幕需要具有名为 `Status` 的属性，以更新其用户界面。The splash screen needs to have property named `Status` that updates its user interface. 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的 "备注" 部分中的说明进行操作。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event StartupNextInstance As StartupNextInstanceEventHandler

summary.span: 在尝试启动单实例应用程序，而该应用程序已处于活动状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to start a single-instance application and the application is already active.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当你尝试在应用程序已处于活动状态时重新启动它时，单实例应用程序会引发 事件。A single-instance application raises the event when you attempt to restart the application when it is already active. 第一次启动单实例应用程序时，它会引发 事件。When a single-instance application starts for the first time, it raises the event. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 此事件在应用程序的主线程上通过其他用户界面事件引发。This event is raised on the application's main thread with the other user-interface events. 这样，事件处理程序便可以直接访问应用程序的用户界面。This allows the event handler to access directly the application's user interface. 但是，如果在引发此事件时，应用程序正在忙于处理另一个用户界面事件，则在其他事件处理程序完成或调用 方法之前，将无法处理此事件。However, if the application is busy handling another user-interface event when this event is raised, this event cannot be processed until the other event handler finishes or calls the method. > [!NOTE] > 仅在单实例应用程序中引发 `StartupNextInstance` 事件。The `StartupNextInstance` event is raised only in single-instance applications. 若要为应用程序启用单实例行为，必须选中 "项目设计器" 中的 "**生成单个实例应用程序**" 复选框。To enable single-instance behavior for your application, you must check the **Make single instance application** check box in the Project Designer. | | |-| |将应用程序设置为单一实例To make an application single instance| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 选中 "**生成单个实例应用程序**" 复选框。3. Select the **Make single instance application** check box.| 必须使用 `e` 参数的 属性访问自变量，以便以后尝试启动单实例应用程序。You must use the property of the `e` parameter to access the arguments for subsequent attempts to start a single-instance application. 属性提供了用于启动单实例应用程序的第一个实例的参数。The property provides the arguments used to start the first instance of a single-instance application. 事件处理程序的代码存储在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中，该文件在默认情况下处于隐藏状态。The code for the event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问应用程序事件的 "代码编辑器" 窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| 下表列出了涉及 `My.Application.StartupNextInstance` 事件的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Application.StartupNextInstance` event. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |检查第一个应用程序实例的命令行参数Check the command-line arguments of the first application instance|| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|是Yes| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用 事件处理程序的 `e` 参数来检查应用程序的命令行参数。This example uses the `e` parameter of the event handler to examine the application's command-line arguments. 如果找到了以 `/input=`开头的参数，则会显示该参数的其余部分。If an argument is found that starts with `/input=`, the rest of that argument is displayed. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#15)] 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的 "备注" 部分中的说明进行操作。To access this window, follow the instructions from this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event UnhandledException As UnhandledExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 在应用程序遇到未经处理的异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application encounters an unhandled exception.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当应用程序遇到未经处理的异常时，将引发 `UnhandledException` 事件。An application raises the `UnhandledException` event when it encounters an unhandled exception. 此事件是 Visual Basic 应用程序模型的一部分。This event is part of the Visual Basic Application model. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Basic 应用程序模型的概述](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md)。For more information, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/development-with-my/overview-of-the-visual-basic-application-model.md). 您可以使用 `e` 参数的 属性访问引发此事件的未处理异常。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to access the unhandled exception that caused this event. 您可以使用 `e` 参数的 属性控制应用程序是否退出。You can use the property of the `e` parameter to control whether the application exits. 默认情况下， `True`。By default, is `True`. 因此，在完成 `UnhandledException` 事件处理程序后，应用程序会退出。Therefore, the application exits after completing the `UnhandledException` event handler. 可以在 `UnhandledException` 事件处理程序中将值设置为 `False`，以使应用程序保持运行状态，并使应用程序返回到等待状态。You can set the value to `False` in the `UnhandledException` event handler to keep the application running, and have it return to a waiting state. `UnhandledException` 事件处理程序的代码存储在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中，该文件在默认情况下处于隐藏状态。The code for the `UnhandledException` event handler is stored in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问应用程序事件的 "代码编辑器" 窗口To access the Code Editor window for application events| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.| 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). > [!NOTE] > Visual Basic 编译器会阻止生成的用于调试的应用程序引发此事件，使调试器能够处理未经处理的异常。The Visual Basic compiler prevents applications that are built for debugging from raising this event, to enable a debugger to handle the unhandled exceptions. 这意味着，如果你正在测试应用程序，请在 Visual Studio 集成开发环境调试器下运行该应用程序，将不会调用你的 `UnhandledException` 事件处理程序。This means that if you are testing your application by running it under the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment debugger, your `UnhandledException` event handler will not be called. 有关生成用于调试的应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[/debug （Visual Basic）](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md)。For more information about building applications for debugging, see [/debug (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/debug.md). ## 任务Tasks 下表列出了涉及 `My.Application.UnhandledException` 事件的任务的示例。The following table lists examples of tasks that involve the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event. |到To|查看See| |-|-| |记录未处理的异常Log unhandled exceptions|[如何：日志异常How to: Log Exceptions](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/log-info/how-to-log-exceptions.md)| ## 按项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 窗体应用程序Windows Forms Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|NoNo| |控制台应用程序Console Application|NoNo| |Windows 窗体控件库Windows Forms Control Library|NoNo| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|NoNo| |Windows 服务Windows Service|NoNo| |网站Web Site|NoNo| ## Examples 此示例使用 `My.Application.UnhandledException` 事件记录所有未经处理的异常。This example uses the `My.Application.UnhandledException` event to log any unhandled exceptions. 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入代码。You must enter the code in the Code Editor window for application events. 若要访问此窗口，请按照本主题的 "备注" 部分中的过程进行操作。To access this window, follow the procedure found in this topic's Remarks section. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic). 由于在将调试器附加到应用程序时不会引发 `UnhandledException` 事件，因此必须在 Visual Studio 集成开发环境外部运行此示例。Because the `UnhandledException` event is not raised when a debugger is attached to the application, you have to run this example outside the Visual Studio Integrated Development Environment. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyApplication#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyApplication/VB/FakeMyEvents.vb#17)]

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，此属性允许设计器为应用程序窗体指定默认的文本呈现引擎。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, this property allows a designer to specify the default text rendering engine for the application's forms.

value.span: 值为 指示应用程序应使用 [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] 的默认文本呈现引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the default text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)].

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则指示应用程序应使用 Visual Basic .NET 2002 和 Visual Basic .NET 2003 的文本呈现引擎。

span.span: A value of indicates that the application should use the text rendering engine for Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 默认情况下，此属性将返回 `False`，以指示用于 [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] 的 GDI 文本呈现引擎可用于应用程序的窗体。By default, this property returns `False` to indicate that the GDI text rendering engine for [!INCLUDE[vbprvblong](~/includes/vbprvblong-md.md)] be used for the application's forms. 但是，你可以重写此属性以返回 `True`，并指定应用程序的窗体使用在 Visual Basic .NET 2002 和 Visual Basic .NET 2003 中使用的 GDI + 文本呈现引擎。However, you can override this property to return `True` and specify that the application's forms use the GDI+ text rendering engine, which is used in Visual Basic .NET 2002 and Visual Basic .NET 2003. 此属性由 构造函数调用。This property is called by the constructor. 在默认情况下，将在 Applicationevents.vb 文件中输入重写 类的方法的代码。Code that overrides methods of the class should be entered in the ApplicationEvents.vb file, which is hidden by default. | | |-| |访问用于重写成员的代码编辑器窗口To access the Code Editor window for overriding members| |1. 在**解决方案资源管理器**中选择一个项目，然后单击 "**项目**" 菜单上的 "**属性**"。1. With a project selected in **Solution Explorer**, click **Properties** on the **Project** menu.
2. 单击 "**应用程序**" 选项卡。2. Click the **Application** tab.
3. 单击 "**查看应用程序事件**" 按钮以打开代码编辑器。3. Click the **View Application Events** button to open the Code Editor.

有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).| ## Examples 此示例演示如何通过重写 属性，将 GDI + 文本呈现引擎设置为应用程序的默认呈现引擎。This example demonstrates how to set the GDI+ text rendering engine as the application's default rendering engine by overriding the property. ```vb Protected Overloads Shared ReadOnly Property UseCompatibleTextRendering() As Boolean Get ' Use the GDI+ text rendering engine. Return True End Get End Property ``` 您必须在 "代码编辑器" 窗口中为应用程序事件输入此代码。You must enter this code in the Code Editor window for application events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic)（应用程序页、项目设计器 (Visual Basic)。For more information, see [Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)](https://docs.microsoft.com/visualstudio/ide/reference/application-page-project-designer-visual-basic).

span.span: Extending the Visual Basic Application Model
Application Page, Project Designer (Visual Basic)
